title: Miss Americana & The Heartbreak Prince
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:11.92] You know I adore you
[00:13.67] I'm crazier for you
[00:15.21] Than I was at 16
[00:16.95] Lost in a film scene
[00:18.78] Waving homecoming queens
[00:20.33] Marching band playing
[00:21.79] I'm lost in the lights
[00:24.85] American glory
[00:26.56] Faded before me
[00:28.01] Now I'm feeling hopeless
[00:29.78] Ripped up my prom dress
[00:31.37] Running through rose thorns
[00:33.09] I saw the scoreboard
[00:34.41] And ran for my life
[00:39.11] No cameras catch my pageant smile
[00:42.32] I counted days, I counted miles
[00:45.69] To see you there, to see you there
[00:49.26] It's been a long time coming, but
[00:51.62] It's you and me
[00:52.93] That's my whole world
[00:54.45] They whisper in the hallway, "She's a bad, bad girl" (okay)
[00:58.30] The whole school is rolling fake dice
[01:00.81] You play stupid games
[01:02.34] You win stupid prizes
[01:04.30] It's you and me
[01:05.75] There's nothing like this
[01:07.32] Miss Americana and The Heartbreak Prince (okay)
[01:10.88] We're so sad, we paint the town blue
[01:13.71] Voted most likely to run away with you
[01:19.43] My team is losing
[01:20.93] Battered and bruising
[01:22.53] I see the high fives
[01:24.11] Between the bad guys
[01:25.84] Leave with my head hung
[01:27.38] You are the only one
[01:28.90] Who seems to care
[01:32.08] American stories
[01:33.78] Burning before me
[01:35.35] I'm feeling helpless
[01:36.84] The damsels are depressed
[01:38.59] Boys will be boys then
[01:40.24] Where are the wise men?
[01:41.71] Darling, I'm scared
[01:46.39] No cameras catch my muffled cries
[01:49.55] I counted days, I counted miles
[01:52.72] To see you there, to see you there
[01:56.52] And now the storm is coming, but
[01:58.84] It's you and me
[02:00.18] That's my whole world
[02:01.54] They whisper in the hallway, "She's a bad, bad girl" (okay)
[02:05.28] The whole school is rolling fake dice
[02:08.04] You play stupid games
[02:09.54] You win stupid prizes
[02:11.70] It's you and me
[02:12.89] There's nothing like this
[02:14.46] Miss Americana and The Heartbreak Prince (okay)
[02:18.04] We're so sad, we paint the town blue
[02:20.91] Voted most likely to run away with you
[02:27.48] 
[02:29.53] And I don't want you to (go)
[02:31.16] I don't really wanna (fight)
[02:32.55] 'Cause nobody's gonna (win)
[02:34.25] I think you should come home
[02:36.00] And I don't want you to (go)

[02:39.00] 'Cause nobody's gonna (win)
[02:40.69] I think you should come home
[02:42.66] And I don't want you to (go)

[02:45.37] 'Cause nobody's gonna (win)
[02:47.12] I just think you should know
[02:48.82] And I'll never let you (go)

[02:51.86] That someday we're gonna (win)
[02:56.54] It's you and me
[02:57.86] That's my whole world
[02:59.21] They whisper in the hallway, "She's a bad, bad girl"
[03:05.86] Oh, I just thought you should know
[03:08.38] You should know
[03:09.26] It's you and me
